{"id":710514257,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1653920096,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/710514257/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if(dividend==divisor)\n            return 1;\n        \n        bool isPositive(dividend<=0 == divisor<0);\n        unsigned int a=abs(dividend);\n        unsigned int b=abs(divisor);\n        unsigned int ans=0;\n        while(a>=b)\n        {\n            short q=0;\n            while(a>(b<<(q+1)))\n                q++;\n            ans+=(1<<q);\n            a=a-(b<<q);\n            \n        }\n        if(ans==(1<<31) && isPositive)\n            return INT_MAX;\n        return isPositive? ans:-ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
